document.full_text: the united states tried to instill confidence on thursday that the global recovery was not at risk as global finance chiefs gathered to advance a plan to prevent future economic crises.
document.title: g20 eyes anti-crisis plan, mulls recovery risks
lines_and_colors: the united states tried to instill confidence on thursday that the global recovery was not at risk as global finance chiefs gathered to advance a plan to prevent future economic crises.
